title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 22.6 - Reporting heavy metal levels in blood and urine
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 22.6 - Reporting heavy metal levels in blood and urine

State Regulations

Every physician, clinical laboratory and health facility in attendance of a person with a blood or urine test resulting in a value at or above those listed in section
22.7
of this Part, shall report such occurrence to the State Commissioner of Health within 10 days of the receipt of the results of such test. The report shall be on such forms as prescribed by the State Commissioner of Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
22.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
